CustomField.description: -Ability to understand instructions and the requirements (written and verbal) -Maintain high levels of clear and concise communication with authorities, agents, forwarders, vendors, colleagues, etc. -Ability to perform administrative work (e.g. but not limited to: keeping a meticulous record of shipment information)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Ability to understand instructions and the requirements (written and verbal) -Maintain high levels of clear and concise communication with authorities, agents, forwarders, vendors, colleagues, etc. -Ability to perform administrative work (e.g. but not limited to: keeping a meticulous record of shipment information)
CustomField.label: Communication Skills [Shipping]
